sentences.en: A mysterious color, purple is associated with both nobility and spirituality.
sentences.cn: 神秘的颜色, 紫色是与这两个贵族和灵性.

sentences.en: And if that happens, then your daughter will be at risk for the all-too-common substitution of sexuality in place of spirituality.
sentences.cn: 如果这真的发生了，那么你女儿便会处于十分常见的危险之中，即以“性”趣取代灵性追求。

sentences.en: Can you say a few words about spirituality in your poems?
sentences.cn: 你能谈谈你的诗作中的灵修 吗 ?

sentences.en: History scholars assessed his research on Qing Dynasty spirituality.
sentences.cn: 历史学家们评估了他对清代宗教研究的历史价值.

sentences.en: In my eyes , wisdom and spirituality are more important.
sentences.cn: 祝愿其和更多人也包括自己能在有生之年达到上善若水的境界.

sentences.en: It rules music, movies, dreams, glamour, illusion, spirituality, and addictions.
sentences.cn: 它主宰音乐 、 电影 、 梦境 、 魅力 、 幻觉 、 灵性和沉迷.

sentences.en: Methods. Critical reflection on how spirituality has been defined.
sentences.cn: 方法:对怎样定义灵性的批判性反思.

sentences.en: Protection, spirituality, peace, purity, truth, sincerity and power.
sentences.cn: 保护感, 充满灵性,神圣, 和平, 纯洁, 真实, 诚挚和力量.

sentences.en: She displays none of the sanctimoniousness often associated with spirituality.
sentences.cn: 在她身上丝毫未见圣职人员常有的那种故作虔诚。

sentences.en: Spirituality has to do with life under God.
sentences.cn: 灵性(的生活)与活在神底下有关.

sentences.en: The clergyman represents both spirituality and alchemy.
sentences.cn: 牧师既从事神职,也会炼丹.

sentences.en: The impact of spirituality on their longevity seems to be inextricably linked.
sentences.cn: 灵性对他们长寿的影响似乎解不开地联系在一起.

sentences.en: This is not the first time that scientists have investigated spirituality.
sentences.cn: 这不是科学家首次研究灵性.

sentences.en: This type of music has a negitive influence on our spirituality.
sentences.cn: 这种音乐对我们的灵性有负面的影响.

sentences.en: To develop students'creativity potential is to identify spirituality with manpower.
sentences.cn: 学生创造性的生长必须达成“人性”与“人力”的同一.

sentences.en: We human are creature of spirituality living with meaning.
sentences.cn: 我们人类是生活在有意义的精神领域里.

words.tran_cn: 圣歌（尤指美国南部黑人的）

trans.tran_en: the quality of being interested in religion or religious matters
